QuestData.Title: Kunchong Treats
QuestData.Description: As Kovok grows, he will require equal parts discipline and reward.$B$BI lack no shortage of discipline, but our supply of meat is almost empty.$B$BTo the south, you will find turtles roaming north of the Lake of Stars and Kypari Zar.$B$BHunt them. Kovok likes the taste of their flesh.
